ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views

Class ExpenseListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.views.ExpenseListActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface

    public class ExpenseListActivity
extends Activity
implements ViewInterface
    This activity displays the list of expenses that is related to the current claim. From here you can edit expenses.
